lines.text: If you were a lobster man, would you go into a haunted house surrounded by hot springs?
Do you think you can kill an alien space bat with bullets?
I had a hunch - not an idea, not even a feeling, more like a rabbit punch to the base of the brain.
Is this the end of Mombo?
Their purpose is clear - maybe not to you, but to me.
It's all very simple! Bunny men from Neptune have invaded Mars!
It means that either he escaped, or he walked backwards from the horizon to commit suicide in this bonfire.
